TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ObfuscationAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ObfuscationAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ObfuscationAttribute sealed : Attribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Delegate | System.AttributeTargets.Enum | System.AttributeTargets.Event | System.AttributeTargets.Field | System.AttributeTargets.Interface | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Parameter | System.AttributeTargets.Property | System.AttributeTargets.Struct, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

summary.span: 指示模糊处理工具对程序集、类型或成员采取指定的操作。

span.span: Instructs obfuscation tools to take the specified actions for an assembly, type, or member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 属性允许程序集作者为其二进制文件添加批注，以便模糊处理工具可以通过最少的外部配置正确处理它们。The and attributes allow assembly authors to annotate their binaries so that obfuscation tools can process them correctly with minimal external configuration. > [!IMPORTANT] > 应用此属性不会自动对应用该属性的代码实体进行模糊处理。Applying this attribute does not automatically obfuscate the code entity to which you apply it. 应用属性是创建模糊处理工具的配置文件的替代方法。Applying the attribute is an alternative to creating a configuration file for the obfuscation tool. 也就是说，它只为模糊处理工具提供说明。That is, it merely provides instructions for an obfuscation tool. Microsoft 建议模糊处理工具的供应商遵循此处所述的语义。Microsoft recommends that vendors of obfuscation tools follow the semantics described here. 但是，并不保证特定工具遵循 Microsoft 建议。However, there is no guarantee that a particular tool follows Microsoft recommendations. 特性具有字符串 属性。The attribute has a string property. 模糊处理工具可以将此属性的字符串值映射到其实现的功能，最好是使用用户可以访问的 XML 配置文件。Obfuscation tools can map the string values of this property to features they implement, preferably by using an XML configuration file that users can access. 定义了两个功能字符串： "default" 和 "all"。The defines two feature strings, "default" and "all". 字符串 "default" 应映射到工具的默认模糊处理功能，而 "所有" 应映射到工具支持的一组完整的模糊处理功能。The string "default" should map to the default obfuscation features of a tool, and "all" should map to the complete set of obfuscation features supported by a tool. 属性的默认值为 "all"，则启用一组完整的模糊处理功能。The default value of the property is "all", enabling the complete set of obfuscation features. 当应用于程序集时， 也适用于程序集中的所有类型。When applied to an assembly, also applies to all types within the assembly. 如果未指定 属性，或设置为 `true`，则该属性也适用于所有成员。If the property is not specified, or is set to `true`, the attribute applies to all members as well. 不指定程序集是公共的还是私有的。 does not specify whether an assembly is public or private. 若要指定程序集是公共的还是私有的，请使用 特性。To specify whether an assembly is public or private, use the attribute. 当应用于类和结构时，如果未指定 属性，或将设置为 `true`，则 也适用于该类型的所有成员。When applied to classes and structures, also applies to all members of the type if the property is not specified, or is set to `true`. 当应用于方法、参数、字段和属性时，该属性仅影响应用它的实体。When applied to methods, parameters, fields, and properties, the attribute affects only the entity to which it is applied. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示具有两个类型的公共程序集： `Type1` 和 `Type2`。The following code example shows a public assembly with two types: `Type1` and `Type2`. 此程序集标记为具有 的模糊处理，这将标记要视为公共的程序集（即 属性 `false`）。The assembly is marked for obfuscation with the , which marks the assembly to be treated as public (that is, the property is `false`). `Type1` 标记为模糊处理，因为该程序集标记为要进行模糊处理。`Type1` is marked for obfuscation because the assembly is marked for obfuscation. 使用 属性将 `Type1` 中的一个成员从模糊处理中排除。One member of `Type1` is excluded from obfuscation, using the property. `Type2` 从模糊处理中排除，但其成员被标记为模糊处理，因为 属性是 `false`的。`Type2` is excluded from obfuscation, but its members are marked for obfuscation because the property is `false`. `Type2` 的 `MethodA` 方法标记为 属性的值 `"default"`。The `MethodA` method of `Type2` is marked with the value `"default"` for the property. 需要为 属性指定 `false`，以避免从模糊处理中排除 `MethodA`，因为 属性的默认值为 `true`。It is necessary to specify `false` for the property to avoid excluding `MethodA` from obfuscation, because the default for the property is `true`. 模糊处理工具不应在模糊处理后去除特性，因为 属性是 `false`的。The obfuscation tool should not strip the attribute after obfuscation because the property is `false`. 此代码示例中的所有其他属性将在模糊处理后被去除，因为未指定 属性，因此默认为 `true`。All the other attributes in this code example are stripped after obfuscation, because the property is not specified, and therefore defaults to `true`. 此代码示例包含用于显示特性及其属性的代码。The code example includes code to display the attributes and their properties. 还可以通过使用[Ildasm （IL 拆装器）](/dotnet/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler)打开 DLL 来检查属性。You can also examine the attributes by opening the DLL with the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](/dotnet/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler). [!code-csharp[ObfuscationAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscationAttribute/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ObfuscationAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscationAttribute/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不指定程序集是公共的还是私有的。 does not specify whether an assembly is public or private. 若要指定程序集是公共的还是私有的，请使用 。To specify whether an assembly is public or private, use .

member this.ApplyToMembers : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 值，该值指示某一类型的特性是否应用到该类型的成员。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the attribute of a type is to apply to the members of the type.

value.span: 如果该特性要应用到类型的成员，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the attribute is to apply to the members of the type; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性应用于成员时，此属性的值将被忽略。The value of this property is ignored when the attribute is applied to a member. > [!IMPORTANT] > 应用此属性不会自动对应用该属性的代码实体进行模糊处理。Applying this attribute does not automatically obfuscate the code entity to which you apply it. 应用属性是创建模糊处理工具的配置文件的替代方法。Applying the attribute is an alternative to creating a configuration file for the obfuscation tool. 也就是说，它只为模糊处理工具提供说明。That is, it merely provides instructions for an obfuscation tool. Microsoft 建议模糊处理工具的供应商遵循此处所述的语义。Microsoft recommends that vendors of obfuscation tools follow the semantics described here. 但是，并不保证特定工具遵循 Microsoft 建议。However, there is no guarantee that a particular tool follows Microsoft recommendations. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示从模糊处理中排除的类型，但排除不适用于其成员，因为 属性是 `false`的。The following code example shows a type that is excluded from obfuscation, but the exclusion does not apply to its members because the property is `false`. 此代码是可以编译和执行的更大示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger example that can be compiled and executed. 请参阅 类。See the class. [!code-csharp[ObfuscationAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscationAttribute/cs/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ObfuscationAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscationAttribute/vb/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Exclude { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Exclude : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 值，该值指示模糊处理工具是否应将类型或成员从模糊处理中排除。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the obfuscation tool should exclude the type or member from obfuscation.

value.span: 如果应用该特性的类型或成员应从模糊处理中排除，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the type or member to which this attribute is applied should be excluded from obfuscation; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 应用此属性不会自动对应用该属性的代码实体进行模糊处理。Applying this attribute does not automatically obfuscate the code entity to which you apply it. 应用属性是创建模糊处理工具的配置文件的替代方法。Applying the attribute is an alternative to creating a configuration file for the obfuscation tool. 也就是说，它只为模糊处理工具提供说明。That is, it merely provides instructions for an obfuscation tool. Microsoft 建议模糊处理工具的供应商遵循此处所述的语义。Microsoft recommends that vendors of obfuscation tools follow the semantics described here. 但是，并不保证特定工具遵循 Microsoft 建议。However, there is no guarantee that a particular tool follows Microsoft recommendations. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个标记为从模糊处理中排除的类型。The following code example shows a type that is marked to be excluded from obfuscation. 无需指定 属性，因为它默认为 `true`，但显式指定它会使意向清晰。It is not necessary to specify the property, because it defaults to `true`, but specifying it explicitly makes your intent clear. 设置为 `false`，以便模糊处理中的排除不适用于类的成员。The is set to `false`, so that the exclusion from obfuscation does not apply to the members of the class. 也就是说，类名称可见，但对成员进行了模糊处理。That is, the class name is visible but the members are obfuscated. `MethodA` 方法用 属性的值 `"default"` 进行标记。The `MethodA` method is marked with the value `"default"` for the property. 需要为 属性指定 `false`，以避免从模糊处理中排除 `MethodA`，因为 属性的默认值为 `true`。It is necessary to specify `false` for the property in order to avoid excluding `MethodA` from obfuscation, because the default for the property is `true`. 将 `false` 属性，以便模糊处理工具在模糊处理后不会去除属性。The property is `false` so that the obfuscation tool will not strip the attribute after obfuscation. 此代码是可以编译和执行的更大示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger example that can be compiled and executed. 请参阅 类。See the class. [!code-csharp[ObfuscationAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscationAttribute/cs/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ObfuscationAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscationAttribute/vb/source.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Feature { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Feature : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串值，该字符串值可由模糊处理工具识别并指定处理选项。

span.span: Gets or sets a string value that is recognized by the obfuscation tool, and which specifies processing options.

value.span: 一个字符串值，可由模糊处理工具识别并指定处理选项。

span.span: A string value that is recognized by the obfuscation tool, and which specifies processing options.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 传递给此属性的值取决于所使用的模糊处理工具。The value passed to this property depends on the obfuscation tool used. 建议模糊处理工具的供应商至少支持 "默认" 和 "全部"。It is recommended that vendors of obfuscation tools support at least "default" and "all". 供应商可以结合使用这些设置和 XML 配置文件。Vendors can use these settings in conjunction with the XML configuration file. > [!IMPORTANT] > 应用此属性不会自动对应用该属性的代码实体进行模糊处理。Applying this attribute does not automatically obfuscate the code entity to which you apply it. 应用属性是创建模糊处理工具的配置文件的替代方法。Applying the attribute is an alternative to creating a configuration file for the obfuscation tool. 也就是说，它只为模糊处理工具提供说明。That is, it merely provides instructions for an obfuscation tool. Microsoft 建议模糊处理工具的供应商遵循此处所述的语义。Microsoft recommends that vendors of obfuscation tools follow the semantics described here. 但是，并不保证特定工具遵循 Microsoft 建议。However, there is no guarantee that a particular tool follows Microsoft recommendations. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个方法，该方法使用 属性的值 `"default"` 进行标记。The following code example shows a method that is marked with the value `"default"` for the property. 需要为 属性指定 `false`，以避免从模糊处理中排除 `MethodA`，因为 属性的默认值为 `true`。It is necessary to specify `false` for the property to avoid excluding `MethodA` from obfuscation, because the default for the property is `true`. 将 `false` 属性，以便模糊处理工具在模糊处理后不会去除属性。The property is `false` so that the obfuscation tool will not strip the attribute after obfuscation. 此代码是可以编译和执行的更大示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger example that can be compiled and executed. 请参阅 类。See the class. [!code-csharp[ObfuscationAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscationAttribute/cs/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ObfuscationAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscationAttribute/vb/source.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool StripAfterObfuscation { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.StripAfterObfuscation : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 值，该值指示模糊处理工具是否应在处理后移除此特性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the obfuscation tool should remove this attribute after processing.

value.span: 如果模糊处理工具应在处理后移除该特性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if an obfuscation tool should remove the attribute after processing; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果库将作为其他应用程序的一部分包括，则不应去除属性，并将其作为该应用程序的一部分进行模糊处理。Attributes should not be stripped if your library will be included as part of another application, and obfuscated as part of that application. > [!IMPORTANT] > 应用此属性不会自动对应用该属性的代码实体进行模糊处理。Applying this attribute does not automatically obfuscate the code entity to which you apply it. 应用属性是创建模糊处理工具的配置文件的替代方法。Applying the attribute is an alternative to creating a configuration file for the obfuscation tool. 也就是说，它只为模糊处理工具提供说明。That is, it merely provides instructions for an obfuscation tool. Microsoft 建议模糊处理工具的供应商遵循此处所述的语义。Microsoft recommends that vendors of obfuscation tools follow the semantics described here. 但是，并不保证特定工具遵循 Microsoft 建议。However, there is no guarantee that a particular tool follows Microsoft recommendations. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个 ，其 属性 `false`，以便模糊处理工具在模糊处理后不会去除属性。The following code example shows an whose property is `false` so that the obfuscation tool will not strip the attribute after obfuscation. 需要为 属性指定 `false`，以避免从模糊处理中排除 `MethodA`，因为 属性的默认值为 `true`。It is necessary to specify `false` for the property to avoid excluding `MethodA` from obfuscation, because the default for the property is `true`. 此代码是可以编译和执行的更大示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger example that can be compiled and executed. 请参阅 类。See the class. [!code-csharp[ObfuscationAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscationAttribute/cs/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ObfuscationAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscationAttribute/vb/source.vb#4)]
